text: San Diego Chargers wide receiver Vincent Jackson was arrested yesterday on suspicion of drunken driving. Jackson failed sobriety tests shortly after 2 a.m. local time on state Route 52, California Highway Patrol Officer Ray Scheidnes said. Jackson was on probation for a previous similar arrest, he said. Jackson, in a statement released through the NFL team, said he did n't think charges would be filed against him. "In the event they are, I look forward to clearing my name and proving my innocence, '' he said.
title: CHARGERS' RECEIVER ARRESTED.
